English (United States)(en-US): Someone will speak first.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 누구 하나가 먼저 말을 걸 거야.

English (United States)(en-US): “Earth has such a sunset, right?
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): "지구의 노을, 참 좋지?"

English (United States)(en-US): “Yes, yes, yes. Sunsets remind me of…”
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): "응, 응, 응. 노을은 있잖아."

English (United States)(en-US): “… a beauty found in what shines briefly.”
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): "짧게 빛나는 것들의 아름다움을 떠올리게 해."

English (United States)(en-US): “Things that last only a moment, and should be cherished.”
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): "찰나로만 머무르기에, 순간을 마음껏 만끽해야 하는 것들 말이야."

English (United States)(en-US): You’ll listen to me, pondering my words,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 너는 내 말을 듣고, 어떠한 표정을 짓거나 몸짓을 하며 생각한 뒤,

English (United States)(en-US): before adding your own two cents.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 사려 깊은 언어로 대답할 테지.

English (United States)(en-US): “Beauty in what shines briefly.”
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): "짧게 빛나는 것들의 아름다움."

English (United States)(en-US): “A musician in their element, a child sprinting, lovers’ eyes meeting… and so on.”
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): "음악가의 몰입, 아이의 뜀박질, 사랑하는 이와의 눈맞춤…. 그런 것들이 떠올라."

English (United States)(en-US): We are in the same place at the same time watching the same thing.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 우린 같은 곳에서 같은 시간을 보내며 같은 곳을 바라보고 있지.

English (United States)(en-US): But can it truly be the same? The sunset’s blush, how it captures my heart and echoes in yours?
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 하지만 그 노을의 붉음이 내 마음을 사로잡는 감각과 너의 마음을 울리는 감각이, 정말 같을까?

English (United States)(en-US): I long to know. What it is behind your face, your words.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 난 너무 궁금해. 너의 표정 속에, 너의 말 뒤에.

English (United States)(en-US): What lies beneath the skin and wavers.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 네 존재의 ‘겉표지’ 너머에 존재할 너만의 내적인 일렁임.

English (United States)(en-US): Glimmers.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 반짝임.

English (United States)(en-US): Aches.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 쓰라림.

English (United States)(en-US): Fluid feelings floating freely.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 수많은 감정들의 유체가 자유로이 표류하는 감각.

English (United States)(en-US): If I could reach it… you and I could be one complete us.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그것을 알 수만 있다면… 너와 나는 온전한 ‘우리’가 될 수 있을 텐데.

English (United States)(en-US): I want to see it for myself!
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 너의 속마음을 직접 보고 싶어!

English (United States)(en-US): But I’ll never really know. Any of it.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그런데 난 알 수 없을 거야. 그 무엇도.

English (United States)(en-US): Because I can only ever be me,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 나는 고작 나일 수밖에 없으며,

English (United States)(en-US): and never you. Not ever.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 결코 네가 될 수 없으니까.
